Articles.Content:
I have 20 or so mods like most of the pals here, and some of them give a lot of science. I already researched all the tech without leaving Kerbin's influence. But I want more stuff to research, so I appreciate any suggestions of mods adding new branches to the tech tree.

Thank you already ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Mod question moved to the mod section.

[Community Tech Tree](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/100385)

[Mod Oriented Tech Tree](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/90938)

[ADIOS Tech Tree](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/108785)

[More science experiments (and things to unlock)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/114246)

Check each of the tech tree threads for mods to use with them
